author: boma_naps
content:
I looked into generating the .io files using rpctestgen against the bal-devnet-1 branch, but found a mismatch PR #726 defines eth_getBlockAccessListByHash and eth_getBlockAccessListByNumber in the eth namespace but go-ethereum bal-devnet-1 implements debug_getBlockAccessList in the debug namespace (single method taking BlockNumberOrHash)
Should PR 726 be updated to match whatâ€™s currently implemented in Geth?

author: boma_naps
content: This is the branch am referring to https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/tree/bal-devnet-1

author: nero_eth
content:
I think vice-verca. Through the BAL hash, the BAL is consensus relevant + dapps have interest in using the BAL. It should be in the eth_ namespace imo.
I saw <@902806914252021830> 's comment regarding renaming them to make the input more clear. I can see that making sense, no strong opinion.

author: boma_naps
content: Okay once this is finalized and updated in Geth I will write the test

author: nero_eth
content: We haven't had this defined yet, only recently. What do you think, <@427903869226582018> ?

author: nero_eth
content: Updated the naming of the methods [here](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/726/commits/359d74be5f112b748e4abe81ac10b23dd3bedf38).
